alert.note: Alert for De Soto; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 8:21PM CDT until June 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DE SOTO...NORTHWESTERN SABINE PARISHES IN NORTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND EASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 820 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Converse, or 14 miles southwest of Mansfield, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Converse, Oak Grove, Huxley, South Mansfield, Noble, Grand Cane, Stanley, Pelican and Toledo Bend Reservoir North. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
